Description: A COROP area in the Netherlands is a region consisting of several municipalities, and is primarily used by research institutions to present statistical data.
Education areas are aggregations of nodal areas based on regional origins and destinations of students in secondary education.
Area defined for the planning of distribution of secondary schools.
Area that is used for the coordination of school dropouts.
Area defined to cluster information on the labour market.
Cluster of municipalities per collaborating region according to the 'Wet gemeenschappelijke regelingen' [#wgr_law]_.
'Basis Registratie Instellingen-nummer', identifier of the institution. Alphanumeric, four characters long.
Identifier (assigned by :ref:`duodata`) of the board of this institution.
